turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about List of Colorado Avalanche players.
turn.1: What is the main team of the Colorado Avalanche?
turn.2: List of Colorado Avalanche players The Colorado Avalanche are a professional ice hockey team based in Denver, Colorado, United States.
turn.3: What division is the team part of?
turn.4: They are members of the Central Division of the Western Conference of the National Hockey League (NHL).
turn.6: The Avalanche arrived in Denver in 1995 after playing since 1972 as the Quebec Nordiques.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Since their arrival, over 190 players have played at least one NHL game for the Avalanche.
turn.9: Did any of the players win the Stanley Cup?
turn.10: Forty-one of those players have won a Stanley Cup championship with the Avalanche.
turn.11: Did any of the players win the cup more than once?
turn.12: Six of those players—Adam Foote, Peter Forsberg, Jon Klemm, Patrick Roy, Joe Sakic and Stephane Yelle—were members of both Cup-winning teams in 1996 and 2001.
